title: Multi-Tenant School Management System (SaaS)
description: Student enrollment & profiles, Fee invoicing (KSh), M-Pesa / Pesapal integration, Report cards & CBC grading, SMS notifications, Parent portal. Why it sells: Schools need digitization and payment automation. Revenue Model: Monthly subscription per school (e.g., KSh 5k–20k/month).

title: Church Management & Tithing Platform
description: Member management, Online giving (M-Pesa, Pesapal), Event management, Sermon uploads, Financial reporting. Why it sells: Churches want structured giving systems. Revenue Model: Setup fee + monthly hosting.

title: Rental & Property Management System
description: Tenant portal, Automated rent reminders, M-Pesa auto-payment reconciliation, Lease tracking, Maintenance requests. Why it sells: Rent tracking + automation = strong value. Revenue Model: Per property subscription.

title: Private Clinic / OPD Lite System
description: Patient registration, Consultation notes, Lab requests, Pharmacy inventory, Revenue dashboard. Why it sells: Many small clinics still use paper. Revenue Model: Per-clinic SaaS subscription.

title: Niche Dropshipping Platform (Kenya-Focused)
description: Build a niche marketplace (Beauty, Agriculture tools, Kids items), Integrated local payments (M-Pesa, Pesapal), Automated WhatsApp order confirmations. Why it sells: Localized platforms outperform generic Shopify clones.

title: Event Ticketing Platform
description: QR ticket generation, Payment gateway, Attendance scanning dashboard. Revenue Model: Percentage per ticket sold.

title: Digital Products Marketplace (Kenyan Creators)
description: Sell ebooks, templates, courses, Instant file delivery, Creator dashboard. Target: Designers, teachers, content creators.

title: Inventory + POS System (Web-Based)
description: Stock tracking, Barcode support, Sales reports, Payment reconciliation. Target: Small shops, pharmacies, hardware stores.

title: Salon & Beauty Booking System
description: Appointment booking, Staff management, Payment integration, SMS reminders. Target: Salons & barbershops.

title: HR & Payroll System (SME Focus)
description: Employee management, Leave tracking, Payroll calculations, Payslip generation, KRA tax logic. High demand among growing businesses.

title: AI Resume Builder (Localized)
description: Kenyan CV format templates, AI-generated summaries, Downloadable PDF. Monetize per download.

title: Online Course Platform (Mini LMS)
description: Course uploads, Video hosting, Payment unlock, Student progress tracking.

title: WhatsApp CRM for SMEs
description: Contact tagging, Conversation tracking, Order management, Broadcast messaging. Very strong for small businesses.

title: SACCO Management System
description: Member contributions, Loan applications, Interest calculation, Dividend distribution. High revenue potential if done well.

title: Agriculture Produce Marketplace
description: Farmers list produce, Buyers place orders, Logistics integration, Bulk pricing. Could align with your parents’ farm branding later.
